monsterInfoDialog: Biggum not like spiders. Too many legs, long hairy legs
Some spiders go squish, some spiders go squash
Goblin gumbo: half part rat, half part... hmm what's other stuff
Ah yes, mud. Nice delicious mud. Warm or cold not matter. Goblin gumbo always good
Can also add mushnoobs to see funny things
Dumb gnomes think they so much better than goblin
They not better than goblin, they just dumb and green
Not brave and strong like goblin
Biggum kill many, many chickens
Best thing Biggum likes to eat
But feathers are bad for Biggums stomach
Imps drop the best loot
Biggum once killed biggest imp ever
Biggum got a blue helmet
Traded it for a pointy stick
Human not kill ironclaw goblin
Weaker tribe goblin fine to kill
Ironclaw goblin too strong for big dumb human
Biggum once was on delicious chicken raid
Farmer chase Biggum into awful big moo pen
Worst day ever
Dogs best friend
Goblins worst enemy
Dey are ugly smelly creatures
A man who beats up other man
He friend of goblins
Silly men with funny clothes
One put hand on Biggums head and say funny words to hex Biggum
Biggum stuck him but get no loot
Evil bully man
One time chase poor Biggum from Fallington to Lumberbridge
Big dumb human put him in his place
Biggum try killing such things for precious stones
But big dumb wizard keep dropping keys same colour as beetroot
Biggum likes beetroot but keys not taste good
The one true enemy of Biggum Flodrot
One day Biggum will get rid of all farmers
And all the chickens will be his
Biggest, meanest rats, not even good for goblin gumbo
Goblins keep them in cage, keep world safe
Goblins not go near big scary wizzingtower
But Biggum once sneak inside
Steal green ball for the glory of ironclaw
Dey not smell so bad as other men
But just as crazy
Silly wildyness humans
They always attack those who are unprepared
They never have courage to fight equal opponent
Biggum teach them a lesson many times
Funny little men
Always very angry
Biggum likes to poke them with stick and run run away
In big battle long ago
Biggum saw more skellingtons than human can imagine
Now almost none left
Red men with bald heads
Make big roar like Biggum and scare them all away
These men are a kind of crazy not even Biggum mess with
Once took their lemonade, they all get very mad
Hexed Biggum and chased him to village of lowland goblins
Biggum likes meat
Rat, chicken, moo, snoozers, raw, cooked and burnt
But these dummies only drop salad
Skellingtons in the making
Walk like normal human do after five beer
Meanies not let goblins live in forest
Put up fences, set out dogs and make signs saying "greenies keep out"
These men run about in dark places like goblins
Biggum respect these men and their wily ways
Dumb dark men have cool castle in wildyness
Maybe Biggum Flotrot will capture such a castle for the glory of goblins
Goblins more worthy than dumb dark men anyway
Like spiders but even weirder
Goblins not often mess with them
Man with goblin antics
He may have taken the ethos of goblin, but not the courage
Silly horse with horn
Wait, what's a horse?
Creepy even for a human
Stick them, chop them, crush them
Just make sure they never leave their creepy cave
Biggum not need target practice
Biggum already expert at throwing things
Me once throw spear into eye of big ugly one-eye
Me thinks his name was Polymephus
Dumb humans with dumb clothes
What they mourning for anyway
Happy peasant surely has many chickens
You distract happy peasant and Biggum will have a look around
Can share spoils
Evil, ugly and up to no good
Best kind of human if human was to ask Biggum Flodrot
Her cooking is also good
Biggum not afraid of no poltergeist
Biggest snoozers Biggum knows
Not good idea to poke a snoozebear
Especially one with little snoozeberries
They get very very mad
Yes yes, big strong warrior human
Humans always think they big strong warrior
But they never as strong and brave as goblin
In great big battle of bluebird plains, humans ran and goblins fought
Humans who not fight for glory and riches
But for something they call greater good
Biggum thinks this is most unnatural
Big dumb humans fighting little dumb gnomes
Biggum finds this arrangement most excellent
Like normal dwarf
But even more angry
Maybe shorter too
Big dumb guards always keep goblins out of cities
As if we savage or something
Biggum wants to stick them with a spear
Goblins sometime raid bandit camp
They exiles much like goblin
Biggums great grandfather fight many men in white rags
At big battle of place with funny name
Goblins just call it battle of first stone circle
Whats a pirate if he has no ship?
Whats a wolf if he has no teeth?
Whats a goblin if he has no green?
Biggum once trained one to be pet
But then it ate other goblin
Had to make wolf barbeque
Worst meal ever
Ugly green gnome with courage
But still no good in battle
Humans very scared of white wolf pass
When human goes there, wolf eats human
When goblin goes there, goblin eats wolf
Like a chicken
But bigger, tastier and angrier
Not really a guard
Just a bully for greedy Shantay
Acting as if greedy dumb Shantay owns desert
Annoying flappy thing
Knock it on the head and it will flap no more
Hoblingoblins always think they better than other goblins
Ironclaw goblins put them in their place
Dumb guards thinking they not guards
Nice bread though
Biggum once fight such a conjurer of skellingtons and zombs
Must kill the conjurer, else he will continue conjuring
Biggum not know what these are guarding
But probably many riches or tasties
Biggum not allowed to kill these yet
Had to sneak into cellar of Radimus to find them
Spiders hide in dumb places
These get very mad if you bonk their boss
Spider eggs very popular in goblin food
Give spicy taste, just like pink berries
Like big dumb human, just much bigger
Biggum once friends with giant
In place called thunder mountain
Biggum not like fighting these
They have spicy swords that sting for long time
These dumb humans steal other dumb humans
Biggum first think it very fun
But then they make Biggum think of hoblingoblins
Now Biggum wants to put them in their place
They part of evil gnome war machine
Biggum teach them lesson they never forget!
Strangest creature Biggum has seen
And Biggum has seen things you wouldn't believe!
Biggum not know what sorcery has made axes fly
But they die just the same with a bonk or two
Dumb guard dogs have ruined many an apple tree raid for Biggum
Dog is goblins worst enemy
Biggums father fight in battle of green wood
Kill very many black knight humans
Drive them away from their own homeland
Evil spiders of course friends with evil gnomes
Squash them all, Biggum says
Not much battle in these mages
They not even fight back
Spellcraft and sorcery no match for pointy stick
Ironclaw goblin use these for combat training
Only get fried little by them
Big firebreathers, not good
Only thing Biggum likes less than knight
Is cowardly knight with no honour
Biggum put goblin curse on such fellows
Dumb golems living in dumb place
Great big cowards with heart of a horse
Wait, what's a horse?
Only spiders that scare Biggum
They not like the light
Kill them with fire, lots and lots of fire
Biggum think human knighthood not more than nepotism
Give them a big bonk and a stab and they fall down easy
White knights of Fallington are very silly
Thinking they strong and mighty in fancy castle
But if not for ironclaw goblins
Black knights of green forest would still be mightiest
Biggum not know where blue men came from
But they better warriors than human
Ogres as tall as two goblins
And they have great big war bonkers
Biggum respects ogres and their wily ways
Like ogre, but green like goblin
Must be best kind of ogre indeed
Maybe ironclaw jogres live some place
Angriest kind of dwarf
Biggum think they eat too much salt
Not good for blood pressure
Should eat better things, like mud and raw chicken
Big mean jungle dogs
They eat all the googly birds
Caged jungle zombs
Good to kill for lazy human
Biggum not lazy, they not good to kill for Biggum
Biggum once live in a mossy giant beard for a fortnight
Not discovered until Biggum started a fire in there
Best den ever
Biggum not like these spicy spiders
Has to eat all his favourite food to kill them
Biggum not allowed to kill these yet
Only able to when being a sneaky sneak
An ice spider
A nice spider
Geddit? Hehehehehehehe
Canis lupus...
Biggum saw these when he visited the land of midnight sun
And became friends with funny men with funny songs
Biggum not even sure what this is supposed to be
Give it a bonk for good measure
From second root of ash tree of life
Out come the children of Aurgelmir
Army of goblin ancestors went to place they come from
But none come home
12 pallydins guarding the king
12 pallydins fighting great big war in south
Few pallydins come home
The rest fell with Rolan the brave
Goblins have song about him
Big ogre boss once call Biggum Flodrot a flathead
Biggum call him bignose funnypants
Now Biggum alive and big ogres boss not
Just a big imp
Biggum kill many imps
Have you ever seen death wing?
They look horrible!
Dead, googly eyes, claw feets
Huge grotesque flappers!
Biggum not allowed in hero guild anymore
They kick poor Biggum out after bathing in fountain
Biggum once friend with jungle dweller
Told Biggum about banana king and bear necessities
And war elephants... but what's elephant?
Imps again...
Just give them a good bashing
That's what Biggum Flodrot does
Biggum not sure what these are guarding
Biggum just likes to brawl with them when visiting Feldip Hills
Easy to start trouble with ogre
Great big goblin warrior once kill many blue firebreathers
Suddenly he become goblin high priest
When first goblin went to drink from Hvergelmir
He met great big evil Surt
And all his fire giant minions
One day Biggum Flodrot shall cast them back into the fire
And fight big jotun Surt
In Muspelheim where fires burn forever
Only hellhound to ever scare Biggum
Was old Garm
Guarding big gate to the land beyond
Biggum remember story of old big red firebreather
Human hero called Sidurg stab it
Sidurg eat firebreather heart and get smart
But he marry the wrong one, not so smart
Brynhilde very brave. Many tales and songs of her
Gudrun not so much. Angry evil human
Biggums grandmother very famous goblin hero
She travel far away over water, mountain, big sand
She tell tales of rakshasa and rakshasi
This thing look like grandmothers tales
Biggum was told bedtime stories of firebreathers of old
Much bigger than puny firebreathers left now
And much warmer fire
Biggums ancestor kill this
And declare: now am become ironclaw
Destroyer of firebreathers
